title: Winterjazz Cologne 2026 – 15 Year Special Edition
description: The 15th anniversary of Winterjazz Cologne features 14 bands and projects across four stages at Stadtgarten and Club Zimmermanns. Curated by Angelika Niescier and Ulla Oster with guest artists including Benoît Delbecq, Alexandra Grimal, Alexander Morsey, Monika Roscher, and Cansu Tanrikulu. The focus remains on exceptional Cologne-based projects and working bands.

title: Critical Sound: Recycle x Bassism
description: Critical Music presents an evening of intelligent, danceable Drum'n'Bass at the pulse of the underground. Kasra delivers technically precise, bass-focused sets. Mefjus is known for his detailed, energetic sound between tech aesthetics and emotional drive. Sequent adds deep liquid sounds and technoid facets. Support from Survey, N'Dee, MC Jamie White. Box 2 hosted by the Bassism Crew with Vilify, Eklekt1k, Grzly Adams, and Tommy Lexxus.

title: Clara Haberkamp »Classical & Jazz in Dialogue«
description: Award-winning pianist Clara Haberkamp, a trailblazer between classical music and jazz, presents two of her formations: the Clara Haberkamp Trio (with Oliver Potratz on bass and Jarle Vespestad on drums) and Duo Azadi (with Iranian cellist Atena Eshtiaghi). Two varied concert halves, bringing classical music and jazz into a dialogue.

Two varied concert halves, bringing classical music and jazz into a dialogue.

Two varied concert halves, bringing classical music and jazz into a dialogue.

title: Trio Ivoire
description: Trio Ivoire, founded 25 years ago by Hamburg pianist Hans Lüdemann, combines piano, balafon, drums, and electronics to create a distinctive sound.
